physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building with Neo-classical architectural features and colonnades. There are other smaller buildings to its left and further into the background. A bridge with criss-cross bars is present and there are a couple of small boats in operation as well.
title_text: General Post Office Singapore, Anderson Bridge, and Fullerton Buildings Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
